title: Don't Just Roll The Dice [Software Pricing] (efendi books)
description:
A usefully short guide to software pricing

How do you price your software? Is it art, science or magic? This usefully short book will help you get the theory, practical advice and case studies you need to stop you reaching for the dice. Recently updated for 2012, with a new look and feel and a bunch of new content, DonÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t Just Roll The Dice is the freshest and most useful guide to software pricing around.

At Business of Software 2007 Michael Pryor held an impromptu session on how to price your software. So many people turned up, and so many people kept on arriving, that by the time theyÃ¢â‚¬â„¢d introduced themselves there was no time left to talk about software pricing. This handbook is an attempt to answer that question.
